'''Star-Shaped Gem''' is a Quest Item obtained from [[Exquisite Chest]]s found in the ruins underneath [[Shirikoro Peak]]. Accessing the chests requires using the [[Peculiar Pinion (Gadget)|Peculiar Pinion]] on walls with a bird-shaped imprint. Three gems are obtainable and are used in the "[[Tsurumi's Mountain Murals]]" [[Hidden Exploration Objectives]].

==Notes==
* Completing the murals grants the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement ''[[Guessing Game]]''.
* Opening 4 walls with the bird-shaped imprint grants the ''Wonders of the World'' achievement ''[[A Tale of Two Cities]]''.
** Only 3 of the walls lead to a chest containing the Star-Shaped Gem.
* Following the 3 [[Electro Seelie]]s released by the murals grants a Luxurious Chest.
